game.name: Whispers of Appalachia
game.shortDescription: A story-driven atmospheric horror set in a forest inspired by Appalachian legends. Avoid patrolling creatures, listen to the whispers, and survive the night.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A story-driven atmospheric horror set in a forest inspired by Appalachian legends. Avoid patrolling creatures, listen to the whispers, and survive the night.
